reviewtext: likes:price: for $4.50 including S+H, you can't get better headphone than this.  this is really a $15-$25 headphone.good audio quality. (see "good for" below)dislikes:headphone is a little uncomfortable to wear due to the rough edges on the crown.  OEM could smooth out the rough edges.need to increase audio volume to compensate headphone's lower than average volume output.good for:regular home TV, talk show, audio book, news programming.bad for:high quality music appreciation (e.g. classical, acoustic, jazz).outdoor activities (uncomfortable to wear during workout)conclusion:i could buy another pair given the high quality to price ratio.
summary: for $4.50, you can't get a better headphone than this but uncomfortable to wear.
